channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: Warming temperatures cause cracks and flooding in the ice road, making the truckers' work a lot more dangerous; Jody and Brett take on the challenge of moving a 66-ton derrick; Hugh runs full steam ahead.

channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: As the pace of the ice road's meltdown quickens, truckers reflect on their first season in the Arctic; some rookies prove to be up to the challenge but others make early exits; highlights and new footage.

channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: Hugh and Eric are neck and neck in their race to claim dominance over the ice road, but time is running out with the ocean waters closing in; the truckers race to remove equipment from the Langley site; an Arctic whiteout threatens operations.[(96057)]
